LanguageData.GreenTiberiumRaw.description: 未加工的泰伯利亚水晶,小心搬运,可以提炼

LanguageData.BookRiparius.label: riparius book
LanguageData.BookRiparius.description:
Tiberium Riparius.

绿色泰伯利亚是最常见的一种泰伯利亚结晶体
在边缘世界被侵蚀之前早就来到了地球.

这种水晶的传播速度是最快的,可以在数天内侵蚀一大片地区

遇到时务必小心.

请不计一切代价避免接触

这种物质能把任何接触的碳基生物水晶化,使得它极其危险.

泰伯利亚是一种不明矿石,可将任何物体转变为其结晶形态.

This happens due to reactions between Tiberium nuclei and the other material's nuclei.
LanguageData.BookVinifera.label: vinifera book
LanguageData.BookVinifera.description:
Tiberium Vinifera.

蓝色泰伯利亚晶体,从绿色的"进化"而来.
比绿色更稀有,侵蚀速度更慢,但更危险,这种泰伯利亚更像是某种寄生性的活物,如果接触的生物没死,那么就会被这种水晶所改造

These Tiberium lifeforms feed on Tiberium if they are animals, or spread it, if they are plants.

It is still unproven how much of living being Tiberium is.

Further investigation is needed.
LanguageData.BookRutila.label: rutila book
LanguageData.BookRutila.description:
Tiberium Rutila.

The red kind of Tiberium, it is very rare.

Just like the blue type, it has even more valuable resources contained.

Although the first sightings showed that it doesn't spread, it seems to have evolved the ability to do so, however, very slowly.

It is speculated that red Tiberium matures into ---[DATA LOST]---/---
